JobFullDesc:
The FCS Executive I - Client Management  will be a specialist in the FCS payment solutions suite and will be responsible for the management of an extensive portfolio of accounts.  The focus of the role is the precise exploration of client’s business pain points with a clear mission to find opportunities for growth as well as bring stability to the organic volumes of the portfolio. The role includes the following responsibilities: 

−Develop a strong relationship with the assigned portfolio of clients and internal stakeholder(s); this requires strong communication skills.

−Timely manage a high volume of inbound and outbound interactions via phone and email: achievement of daily, weekly, and monthly targets of outbound contacts promoting the usage of the existing card program and the maximization of credit lines, the deployment of trigger campaigns, data gathering related to compliance requirements, and engagement in specific operational tasks.

−Support and manage objections and difficult conversations and client petitions from start to finish, holding a blue box mindset.

−Continuously quick-learn; the role demands a swift immersion on the basics of the operational processes, rules of engagement and regulatory environment specific to the business unit, which are updated regularly. Fast learning aptitudes are a must.
−Bachelor's Degree in Business Administration or related branch of studies; highly specialized experience will be considered.

−Knowledgeable in Microsoft Office tools. Additional knowledge of  One.Force is desirable.

−2-5 years of specific experience with over-the-phone relationship management.

−Fluent in English (oral and written).

−Available to work full time in-person on a standard business schedule.
